headline: How Kentucky Project Approvals at PPL (PPL) Have Changed Its Investment Story
summary: In recent days, PPL Corporation received approval from Kentucky regulators for the construction of two new natural gas combined-cycle units and environmental facility upgrades, supporting long-term electricity demand and grid reliability in the region. This regulatory approval aligns with PPL’s plans to deploy up to US$20 billion for grid modernization and expansion through 2028, highlighting the company’s efforts to meet surging demand from data center growth and broader...
